committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to extend certain whistleblower protections to personnel of Government corporations.

summary.text: Amends the Civil Service Reform Act of 1978 to afford employees of Government corporations protection against retaliation for disclosing fraud, waste, and mismanagement to the extent that a prohibited personnel practice occurring after the date one year before this Act's enactment is involved.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to extend certain whistleblower protections to personnel of Government corporations.
